question: Which among the following is correct regarding Loan Syndication?
option1: More than one debtors applying for a loan to one creditor
option2: More than one creditors coming together to provide single loan
option3: More than one creditors coming together to provide multiple loans
answer: More than one creditors coming together to provide single loan
explanation: Syndicated lending is a form of lending in which a group of lenders collectively extend a loan to a single borrower. The group of lenders is called a syndicate. The loan is called a syndicated loan.
